text.section: This section applies only in Dorchester County.

It is unlawful for any licensee under this article to allow a person not designated in § 1-102(a)(6) of this article to loaf or loiter about the place of business for which the license is issued. Violation of this subsection is punishable by a fine not to exceed $100.
